backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file declaring an empty feature evidence report.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to descriptive summaries of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH-themed CSS variables and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the frontend and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling asset validation flow, overlays, theatre scene, and preview controls.
frontend/src/components/AssetScanResults: Overlay listing validated assets with refresh, resync, and continue actions.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhou: Background component rendering a large faint silhouette of logo2-1.png.
Centered logo with a two-phase remount and subtle halo effect.
frontend/src/components/MissingAssetOver: Overlay showing missing asset warnings with optional refresh and resync buttons.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSyncContr: Floating popover with refresh, resync, and validated publish controls.
frontend/src/components/TheatreStageScen: Fullscreen theatre scene with curtains, seating, aisle, and lighting effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, login/logout flow, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing; reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequiredAssets.ts: Validates required image assets at startup, detects missing files, and supports refresh-based rechecks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/publishSlug.ts: Utilities for sanitizing, validating, and generating publish slugs with strict character and length rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended color tokens, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining STEP 1 goals, asset requirements, known issues, and architectural notes.
